item.title: Black Box 1 Flag Writeup
item.description: Previous Exploit Doing a search of Control 4 C4-HC250-BL + exploit in Google netted us with the default password used to exploit. http://www.davidsonfamily.ca/discussion-board/topic/logging-into-controller/ Black Box 1 Flag I noticed there was a Black Box Challenge for Control 4, which we previously exploited. With the password we previously used, we could ssh into the ip to access the directory: /etc/init.d/c4server. We took the MD5 sum of /etc/init.d/c4server to retrieve the flag.
